full_summary:
**RFP Title**
R138393 - SW-88925 - Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Solution for Canada Revenue Agency

**Scope**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites qualified Standing Offer (SO) Holders of the SSC Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Solution Standing Offer to submit a proposal for a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solution for the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA). The proposed solution will be used to automate business processes and provide improved operational efficiency.

**Background**
The SSC RPA Solution Standing Offer is a multi-year, multi-supplier contract for the provision of RPA solutions. The current solicitation is for a 4-year contract period, with the option to extend up to 25 years or $70M in value. The selected supplier will become the incumbent solution and will be invited to participate in follow-on requirements.

**Key Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-07T17:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-07-06
* Publication Date: 2023-06-20

**Contracting Requirements**

* The proposed solution must meet the requirements outlined in the SSC RPA Solution Standing Offer.
* The solution must be able to automate business processes for the CRA.
* The solution must provide improved operational efficiency and reduce processing costs.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is open to all qualified suppliers, including those with trade agreements with the Government of Canada. The following trade agreements are applicable:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Accessibility**
Documents may be submitted in either official language. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**Inquiries**

All inquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted to the contracting authority, Matthew Woods, at Matthew.Woods@ssc-spc.gc.ca. Solicitation documents will be sent directly to qualified Standing Offer Holders.

**Standards Council Award**

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Agreement on Internal Trade (AIT)
* Agreement on a Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP)
* World Trade Organization
